text: @bethanykraft Hey! This is Jeremy Jacobs from E&E News. Working on a story I thought you'd have some thoughts on. Could you DM me if you have a second to chat this morning? Thanks!
author: GreenwireJeremy

text: Guess who has a problem with the Colorado River #DCP legislation? Barbara Boxer, former Senate Enviro Cmte chair. See our story, and her op-ed today. https://www.eenews.net/greenwire/2019/03/20/stories/1060127745 … ($) and

text: Couldn't agree more @ryrivard . And odds are Chairman Huffman, a former NRDC lawyer, isn't going to be thrilled about the legislative language.
